meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jacob Laux Ben Ingram Sonrisa Cooper Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6641.

td.p: Jacob Laux, an administrative assistant from Rancho Santa Margarita, California
Ben Ingram, an IT consultant originally from Florence, South Carolina
Sonrisa Cooper, a project assistant from Jamaica Plain, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,400)

tr.td: ARMED FORCES RADIO WITH PAT SAJAK
PAINTERS' MONOGRAMS
VERTICAL LANDMARKS
CELEBRITY PALS
THE "RIGHT"
OF SPRINGS
